homePage.secondaryText: Reestablish legitimacy and accountability in blockchain governance by uncompromised  consensus of all EOS holders on and off chain.
homePage.placeholder: Enter your email to join the movement and receive intro PDF.
homePage.eligibility: Only those BPs who join the #NovotebuyEOS Alliance by signing the pledge below will be considered for vote:

homeText.joinLabel: Join the movement and receive intro PDF deck.
homeText.text2: Do you keep your EOS on centralized exhanges?
homeText.text3: Are you an on-chain account holder?
homeText.text7: The EOS based proxy facilitates the transition into a truly democratic based chain that is free from Pareto control by voting for BP’s that do not engage with direct vote rebate.
homeText.text8: EOS came with the vision of becoming a governed blockchain.
homeText.text9: But without no-vote-buy rule, DPoS isn’t much different than all PoW or PoS in which the consensus is captured by the pareto distribution.
homeText.text10: EOS is on the verge of becoming the only blockchain that is free from the grip of pareto distribution with fractal democracy.
homeText.text11: But it needs support from the BPs.
homeText.text12: NovotebuyEOS Proxy is an EOS BP voting proxy that aims to properly represent the uncompromised will of EOS holders on and off chain.
homeText.text13: The baseline function of NovotebuyEOS Proxy is to ensure the integrity of its vote and the accountability of BPs representing communities' will for the votes they receive. This will be achieved through holding regular check-up calls with BPs and reviewing reports of their finances and activities.
homeText.text14: OneDAO proxy will only votes from among the list that passes the integrity bar.
homeText.text15: Heal the governance with greater alignment of interests
homeText.text16: We will not engage in vote compromise in any form. (operating our own proxy with direct APR, buying votes from 3rd party exchanges or proxies.)
homeText.text17: We will commit to being held accountable by engaging in check up calls and providing public financial and operation reports on a regular basis.
homeText.text18: We acknowledge that we can be unvoted immediately and won’t be eligible for votes from this DAO ever again if we engage with compromised votes hereafter.
